Rufford Abbey, Rufford Country Park, Notts. Rebranded as "Sound of Brass".
Contest for 1st/2nd/3rd/4th section bands.
8 bands played.
Aug. 19, 2011, 4:35 p.m. March 31, 2012, 7:16 a.m.
